languages.text: {n}Чародей издает надменный смешок. Его глубокий, полный потусторонних вибраций голос заставляет внутренности сжиматься.{/n} "Чего стоит имя гниющего трупа, взгроможденного на Золотой Трон? Оно не страшит истинно верующих".

{n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."
languages.original_text: {n}Чародей издает надменный смешок. Его глубокий, полный потусторонних вибраций голос заставляет внутренности сжиматься.{/n} "Чего стоит имя гниющего трупа, взгроможденного на Золотой Трон? Оно не страшит истинно верующих".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink.{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon a throne of gold? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

{n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink.{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon a throne of gold? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

{n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink.{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

{n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

languages.text: {n}巫师哼了一声。他低沉的声音不自然地回荡着，你的心不由自主地颤抖起来。{/n}“黄金王座那具腐尸的名字又能有什么用呢？真正的虔诚之人毫不畏惧这孱弱的名字。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}巫师哼了一声。他低沉的声音不自然地回荡着，你的心不由自主地颤抖起来。{/n}“黄金王座那具腐尸的名字又能有什么用呢？真正的虔诚之人毫不畏惧这孱弱的名字。”

languages.text: {n}Le sorcier pousse un grognement dédaigneux. Sa voix profonde aux vibrations anormales vous tord le ventre.{/n} « À quoi bon invoquer le nom d'un cadavre en décomposition posé sur le Trône d'Or ? Il ne risque pas de faire trembler les disciples de la foi véritable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sorcier pousse un grognement dédaigneux. Sa voix profonde aux vibrations anormales vous tord le ventre.{/n} « À quoi bon invoquer le nom d'un cadavre en décomposition posé sur le Trône d'Or ? Il ne risque pas de faire trembler les disciples de la foi véritable. »

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーが嘲笑う。彼の深く、不自然に振動する声が、身体を内側から縮こまらせる。{/n}「黄金の玉座に支えられた朽ち果てた死体の名前になんの意味があるというのか。真の信仰の弟子たちにとっては無意味な名だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーが嘲笑う。彼の深く、不自然に振動する声が、身体を内側から縮こまらせる。{/n}「黄金の玉座に支えられた朽ち果てた死体の名前になんの意味があるというのか。真の信仰の弟子たちにとっては無意味な名だ」

languages.text: {n}El hechicero se burla. Las vibraciones de su profunda voz hacen que se te retuerzan las tripas.{/n} «¿De qué sirve el nombre de un cadáver marchito situado sobre el Trono Dorado? No infunde temor alguno en los discípulos de la verdadera fe».
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hechicero se burla. Las vibraciones de su profunda voz hacen que se te retuerzan las tripas.{/n} «¿De qué sirve el nombre de un cadáver marchito situado sobre el Trono Dorado? No infunde temor alguno en los discípulos de la verdadera fe».

languages.text: {n}Der Hexer schnaubt verächtlich. Seine tiefe, unnatürlich vibrierende Stimme lässt deine Eingeweide schrumpfen.{/n} "Was nutzt der Name eines verwesenden Leichnams, der auf dem Goldenen Thron festgebunden wurde? Er macht den Jüngern des wahren Glaubens keine Angst."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer scoffs. His deep, unnaturally vibrating voice causes your insides to shrink:{/n} "What good is the name of a rotting corpse propped upon the Golden Throne? It carries no fear for the disciples of the true faith."
